original_text: We always thank God for you, our Christian friends that the Lord loves. We ought to thank God, because he has chosen to save you. God chose you to belong to him, as some of the first people that he would save. You believed God's true message. And God's Spirit makes you separate from things that are bad.
korean_text: 주께서 사랑하시는 형제들아 우리가 항상 너희에 관하여 마땅히 하나님께 감사할 것은 하나님이 처음부터 너희를 택하사 성령의 거룩하게 하심과 진리를 믿음으로 구원을 받게 하심이니

sentences.original_text: We always thank God for you
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 항상 너희를 위해 하나님께 감사합니다

sentences.original_text: our Christian friends that the Lord loves
because he has chosen to save you
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그가 너희를 구원하기로 선택하셨기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: God chose you to belong to him
as some of the first people that he would save
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 구원할 첫 사람들 중 일부로서

sentences.original_text: And God's Spirit makes you separate from things that are bad
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 하나님의 영은 너희를 나쁜 것들로부터 분리시킵니다
